topic.title: What is the recommended hardware configuration for the IDE or Viewer?

ul.li: Desktop platform capable of running Java 1.6 ( e.g. Windows PC, Linux desktop, Unix desktop, Apple Mac )
Native display resolution of 1400 by 1050 or greater
7400 RPM hard disk with 40GBytes or more available space
Dual core processor of 2.6 Ghz or greater.
